name: STEAMUniverseNews
0:
”Alexa, what's my Flash Briefing?”
”Alexa, play my Flash Briefing”
skdetail:
Flash Briefing Skill
This skill contains: dynamic content.
des: Stay up-to-date in the world of STEM and STEAM education with our daily feed of news, research and more from STEAM Universe. Topics include robotics, makerspaces, computer science, grants, professional development, 3D printing and more.
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
